post.title: official motorola droid a855 release thread - keep all phone discussion here
post.content: use this thread to talk about the motorola droid a855. keep all major discussion about the phone here. verizon link for purchase: http://www.verizonwireless.com/b2c/s...edphoneid=5069 http://cache.vzw.com/multimedia/360_demos/mot_droid/ motorola's droid page: http://www.motorola.com/consumers/us...la-droid-us-en user manual (pdf) http://home.comcast.net/~fauguy/droi...ser_manual.pdf before asking a question, please look in the pre-release thread, as it may have already been answered. http://www.howardforums.com/showthre...9page=1pp=15 -------------------------------------------------- other useful threads: motorola droid accessories discussion http://www.howardforums.com/showthread.php?t=1582867 motorola droid faq tips-and-tricks http://www.howardforums.com/showthread.php?t=1586942 motorola droid picture-of-the-day, camera reviews issues http://www.howardforums.com/showthread.php?t=1585750 motorola droid hardware and software versions tracking thread http://www.howardforums.com/showthread.php?t=1587028
